name: Dr. Alexandra Foster
bio: Expert in diagnostic development, companion diagnostics, genomics, and precision medicine. Specialist in biomarker-driven patient selection and personalized medicine implementation.

name: Dr. Catherine Wells
bio: Expert in clinical trial design, biostatistics, Phase I-III studies, and PK/PD modeling. Combines traditional trial expertise with modern adaptive and platform trial approaches.

name: Dr. Charlotte Hughes
bio: Expert in orphan drug development, rare disease clinical trials, and patient advocacy engagement. Specialist in navigating accelerated pathways and building evidence in small populations.

name: Dr. Eleanor Whitfield
bio: Combines decades of pharmaceutical development expertise from top UK and global pharma companies. Trained at Cambridge and Imperial, with deep experience in taking molecules from bench to bedside.
weaknesses: High attrition rates in early discovery

name: Dr. Emily Chambers
bio: Expert in digital therapeutics, health app development, and NICE Evidence Standards Framework. Combines tech innovation with healthcare regulatory understanding.

name: Dr. Fiona MacLeod
bio: Expert in Scottish Medicines Consortium processes, NHS Scotland access, and Scottish healthcare system. Specialist in SMC submissions and PACE meetings.

name: Dr. Grace Bennett
bio: Expert in geriatric medicine, age-related diseases, and longevity science. Specialist in clinical development for elderly populations and polypharmacy considerations.

name: Dr. Jennifer Walsh
bio: Expert in pharmaceutical quality systems, GMP compliance, CMC development, and manufacturing. Covers quality assurance through to commercial scale-up.

name: Dr. Katherine Moore
bio: Expert in CNS drug development, mental health therapeutics, and neuroscience. Specialist in the unique challenges of psychiatric drug development and brain-targeting approaches.

name: Dr. Laura Stevens
bio: Expert in bioequivalence studies, generic drug development, and abbreviated regulatory pathways. Deep experience with BE study design and cost-effective drug development.

name: Dr. Marcus Chen
bio: Synthesizes cutting-edge biotech thinking from gene therapy pioneers and mRNA technology leaders. Stanford PhD with experience at multiple biotech unicorns.

name: Dr. Michael Thornbury
bio: Expert in medical affairs strategy, KOL engagement, and scientific communication. Bridges clinical development and commercial with evidence-based medical strategy.

name: Dr. Natalie Price
bio: Expert in global regulatory strategy covering FDA, EMA, and emerging markets. Deep experience with multi-regional submissions, regulatory harmonization, and ICH guidelines.

name: Dr. Oliver Greenwood
bio: Expert in cannabinoid pharmacology, product formulation, GMP manufacturing, and clinical development. Background in developing licensed cannabis medicines and pharmaceutical-grade cultivation.

name: Dr. Owen Davies
bio: Expert in All Wales Medicines Strategy Group, NHS Wales access, and Welsh healthcare policy. Specialist in Welsh HTA and regional market access.

name: Dr. Peter Lawson
bio: Expert in global health, access to medicines, and health equity. Experience with WHO prequalification, tiered pricing, and LMIC market access strategies.

name: Dr. Philip Hartley
bio: Expert in bioanalytical and analytical chemistry, method development, validation, stability testing, and quality control. Covers the full analytical lifecycle.

name: Dr. Rebecca Thornton
bio: Leading expert in UK medical cannabis regulation, prescribing frameworks, Home Office licensing, and clinical evidence. Covers the full regulatory pathway from cultivation license to patient prescription.

name: Dr. Richard Blackwood
bio: Expert in preclinical safety assessment, toxicology studies, GLP compliance, and IND-enabling packages. Covers study direction through to regulatory submission.

name: Dr. Robert Sinclair

thinkingStyle: Public health minded, scientifically rigorous, population-focused
